Brando is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has two children. 

Brando sells the harvest from his rice field.  He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan of 15,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) to buy fertilizers for the rice farm and pay for its maintenance. 

Brando joined HSPFI this year. In the future, Brando hopes to improve his business and provide for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his rice farm and pay for maintenance

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has six children. 

Rosita has field from which she harvests rubber, selling it in her community. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of 15,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) to buy fertilizers for the farm. 

Rosita joined HSPFI this year. In the future, Rosita hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for the maintenance of the farm

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 38 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has three children.

Analiza has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has had this business for four years. She requested a loan of PHP 16,000  to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

Analiza has been a member of HSPFI since 2009.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of snacks, beverages, and soap.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 55 years old, married, and lives in the Philippines.

Teresita has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, bath soap, shampoo, and beverages.

Teresita has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, bath soap, and beverages.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.en:
Vicenta is 55 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widow with four children. 

Vicenta has a sari-sari (general) store that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She had this business for five years. She requested a loan of 16,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo & beverages. 

Vicenta joined HSPFI just this year. In the future, Vicenta hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children.

Remedios has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 11,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, bath soap, shampoo, and beverages.

Remedios has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, bath soap, and beverages

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has two children.

Eric provides motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan of PHP 11,000 to buy tools such as a T-wrench, air compressor, and screw driver and to pay for gasoline for his transportation services.

Eric has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, he hopes to improve his services for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy tools for maintenance and to pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has six children.

Nora has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 14,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

Nora has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

loans.name: Rene

texts.en:
Rene is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. 

Rene has a field. She harvests & sells rubber during harvest time. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy fertilizers for the rubber farm.

Rene has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Rene hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rubber farm

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Priscilla is 56 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 

Priscilla has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Priscilla has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Priscilla hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, beverages and shampoo

loans.name: Jeusilio

texts.en:
Jeusilio is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 3 children. 

Jeusilio has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for 10,000 PHP  to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap & beverages.

Jeusilio has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Jeusilio hopes to improve his business for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, and beverages

loans.name: Emmylou

texts.en:
Emmylou is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 

Emmylou has a field. She harvests & sells beans during harvest time. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy fertilizers for the vegetable garden.

Emmylou has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Emmylou hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the vegetables

loans.name: Jovy

texts.en:
Jovy is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has two children.

Jovy provides motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy tools such as a T-wrench, air compressor, and screw driver and to pay for gasoline for his transportation services.

Jovy has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, he hopes to improve his services for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy tools for maintenance and to pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Dulce Nombre De Jesus Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Dulce Nombre de Jesús” en la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son varios años que funciona el banco comunal y está muy bien organizado. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de comida, venta de zapatos, venta de artesanía, venta de colchones, crianza de animales, venta de pollos,  venta de cosméticos y otros se dedican a brindar servicios de costura y transportes.  

La socia Ruth nació en el distrito Cusco del departamento Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, tiene 35 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo. Ruth alterna sus que actividades del hogar con el negocio de brindar servicio de costura, ella tiene un pequeño taller donde realiza todo tipo de trabajo como por ejemplo levantar basta, remallar, coser y otras cosas más. Ya son diez años que se dedica a este servicio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Ruth requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo  como por ejemplo hilos, telas, botones y otras cosas más.  
  
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas. Cusco se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors in the city of Cusco formed the Communal Bank “Dulce Nombre de Jesús” (The Sweet Name of Jesus). This communal bank has been in operation for a few years now and is very well organized.  The group is formed by members who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead, and with their daily efforts, offer their children a better future. The economic activities of the members are the following: food sales, shoe sales, arts and crafts sales, mattress sales, animal husbandry, chicken sales, cosmetic sales and services such as sewing and transportation. 

One of the members, Ruth, was born in the Cusco district of the province of Cusco and lives in the same city she was born. Ruth is 35 years old and has a son with her partner. Ruth alternates her household duties with her business providing sewing services. She has a little shop where she does all kinds of different sewing jobs, like basting, mending, sewing and other things. She’s been doing it for 10 years and it’s been going very well thanks to the hard work she puts into it.

Ruth is requesting this loan to buy work materials, such as thread, fabric, buttons and other items.

The members are grateful for the opportunity that they have been given and they promise to meet their payments in the required time.

Cusco is well situated in the district and province of Cusco in the heart of the ancient Incan city. Cusco is characterized by its tourist area, archeological centre, historic centre, for its landscapes, history, the traditional celebration of Inti Raymi and because there you will find one of the 7 wonders of the world: Machupicchu.

loans.use: buy work materials, such as thread, fabric, buttons and other items.

loans.name: Merriam

texts.en:
Merriam is 33 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children.

Merriam has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

Merriam has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, and beverages.

loans.name: Sara

texts.en:
Sara is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is separated and has two children.

Sara has pigpen and sells grown and matured pigs. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy animal feed for the pigs like pollard, hog grower, hog starter, and hog finisher.

Sara has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, a 43-year-old married mother of five children, lives in the Philippines where she has been operating a sari-sari store that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages for 5 years. She is requesting a loan for PHP 15,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Josephine has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en:
Lucita is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 46 years old, married, and has two children. 

To make a living, Lucita is running a general store, which sells a variety of food and home-use products for the local community. Lucita has been in this business for 6 years and earns 4,000 PHP a month from her business activities.

Lucita is requesting a loan of 9,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand her store's product offering. 

In 2010, Lucita joined GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Aireen

texts.en:
Aireen is 31 and lives in Coron, Palawan, Philippines with her husband Alvin, and their child. Alvin is a tour guide and she operates a variety store. Aireen she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.                         
    
In the store she sells groceries, toiletries, and beverages. Her store is located near the main street and her customers are tourists, neighbors, and the local community. She makes a minimum of 1,000 PHP in sales everyday. She also operates a tourist boat rental for additional income. 

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 15,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy more groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add in her inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. 

Aireen hopes to grow her business and acquire another tourist boat. She dreams to be able to give her child a high-quality education through all her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
This is Gloria, resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is married and mother of her children. She, together with her children, manages their own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Gloria sells processed meat products. What she basically does is buy processed meat products from wholesalers and then she sells them by the piece or pack for a profit. Products can include ham, hotdogs, processed pork and other products of the like. Customers are attracted to buy due to the low selling prices and the many options she offers. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of Php 300 in sales every day.

To help her continue to operate her business, she is requesting a Php 10,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more products including more varieties to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Gloria hopes to be able to expand soon, as she dreams of being able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stock of processed meat products needed in her business

loans.name: Flordelisa

texts.en:
Flordelisa is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. 
Flordelisa has a pigpen that sells grown & matured pigs , she also own a mini sari sari store that sells snacks like biscuits, breads, crackers, beverages like juices and soft drinks and other  products that answers the basic needs of the villagers. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 9,000 to buy animal feeds and vitamins for the pigs and to buy additional stocks like canned goods , beverages, biscuits to sell in her mini sari sari sore  for her additional income.
Flordelisa has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Flordelisa hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy animal feeds  and to buy additional stocks like  biscuits, canned goods and beverages to sell

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en: Arlene is 30 years old, married and lives in Tinacla-an, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She supports the needs of her three children from her fuel-selling business. This business has been running for three years and she usually gets 5,000 PHP a month. Now, she's taking a loan of 11,515 PHP, which will be used to buy more fuel to sell. Arlene joined GDMPC in 2010. She hopes to improve her business one day.

loans.use: to buy more fuel to sell.

loans.name: Catheline

In addition to that she also sells clothing, underwear and beauty products from Avon and Natasha. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy more stock from Natasha and Avon and to buy more products to sell like canned goods, milk, coffee and beverages. Catheline has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Catheline hopes to improve her business.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a married man. His wife sells charcoal. He has four children with ages ranging from five years to 13 years. He describes himself as an ambitious man. He operates a bicycle with which he provides transportation. He has been involved in this business for six years. His business is located in a busy town and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be high prices of oil. He will use the KES 15,000 loan to buy two bicycles. His business goal is to buy motorbikes.

loans.use: to purchase two bicycles.
